00068 //----------------------------------------------------------
00069 template< typename _T >
00070 void
00071 GrKFInterpolator::FindKeyFrame( const _T*& curKF, const _T*& nextKF, unsigned int& curKFIdx, const UFastArray< _T >& kfArray, unsigned int fixedTime )
00072 {
00074         unsigned int kfCount = kfArray.GetElemCount() - 1;
00075         B_ASSERT( curKFIdx < kfCount );
00076 
00077         curKF = &kfArray[ curKFIdx ];
00078 
00080         if ( fixedTime < curKF->time )
00081         {
00082                 curKFIdx = 0;
00083                 curKF = &kfArray[ curKFIdx ];
00084                 nextKF = &kfArray[ curKFIdx + 1 ];
00085         }
00086         else
00087                 nextKF = &kfArray[ curKFIdx + 1 ];
00088 
00090         while ( fixedTime > nextKF->time )
00091         {
00093                 ++curKFIdx;
00094                 curKFIdx %= kfCount;
00095 
00097                 curKF = nextKF;
00098                 nextKF = &kfArray[ curKFIdx + 1 ];
00099         }
00100 }
